sections.heading: Change Values
sections.description: You can change the value of a specific item by referring to its key name:

sections.heading: Update Dictionary
sections.description: The update() method will update the dictionary with the items from the given argument. The argument must be a dictionary, or an iterable object with key:value pairs.
